title: Digital Art Workshop: From Concept to Creation
description: Join professional illustrator Maya Williams for a hands-on workshop covering the fundamentals of digital art creation. Learn techniques for concept development, composition, color theory, and digital painting. Suitable for beginners and intermediate artists.

title: Spring Showcase Exhibition
description: Our quarterly exhibition featuring selected works from young artists across all creative disciplines. Join us for the opening night to meet the creators and enjoy refreshments. Exhibition runs for two weeks following the opening event.

title: Music Production Masterclass
description: Grammy-nominated producer Marcus Chen leads this intensive masterclass on modern music production techniques. Topics include beat-making, mixing, sampling, and developing your unique sound. Participants should have basic familiarity with a DAW (Digital Audio Workstation).

title: Creative Writing Challenge: Urban Tales
description: A month-long writing challenge focusing on stories set in urban environments. Weekly prompts will be provided, and participants will share their work for feedback. The challenge culminates in a virtual reading event for selected pieces.

title: Portfolio Review Day
description: Sign up for a 20-minute one-on-one session with an industry professional to receive personalized feedback on your creative portfolio. Mentors from various disciplines will be available. Advance registration required.

title: Collaborative Dance Project
description: A four-week collaborative project bringing together dancers, musicians, and visual artists to create an interdisciplinary performance. Weekly workshops will guide the creative process, culminating in a final performance. Open to all skill levels.
